resources.string: Alexandros Mograine was the name of the original Lich King
Sylvannas Windrunner ordered the burning of Teldrassil
Mathias Shaw and Flynn Fairwind became lovers after Battle for Azeroth concluded
The SI:7 is a secretive Horde band of rogues who gather info for Orgrimmar
Odyn gave up his eye to be able to peer into the Shadowlands
Illidan sacrificed his freedom to imprison Yogg-Saron in Seat of the Pantheon
Sargeras was the titan that tore a hole in Azeroth with his sword
The Brokers are a group of inter-dimensional traders that were first introduced in The Burning Crusade
Darion Mograine killed his own father, Alexandros, in service of The Lich King
